attributes.action: Petition for former Southampton footballer Francis Benali to get an OBE
attributes.background: Franny has done so much fundraising for Cancer Research, and is doing 7 Ironmans in 7 days. He is hoping to raise 1 million pounds for Cancer Research. This man is an absolute legend, always thinking of others, but shuns publicity, so an OBE would be a fitting reward for his efforts.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour.  

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here: 

https://www.gov.uk/honours
